snippet.title: Police Force - Case 1: Barker Residence - FULL PLAY (all evidence)
snippet.description:
Police Force is a hybrid horror FPS game made by Black Eyed Priest Games.

A police officer, in the most horrifying and deadliest situations you can imagine. Collect evidence, save hostages, and do whatever it takes to bring bloodthirsty criminals to justice.  

CURRENT CASE: The Barker Residence
Respond to a routine domestic disturbance call.  However, after arriving, it becomes apparent that there is more to this disturbed family than initially thought.  Make your way through the Barker House in search of their young daughter and get her to safety.  Reports indicate that the patriarch of the family, Adam Barker, is still inside the house and is presumed armed and dangerous. 

Timestamp of each all evidence:
01:27 - #1 Pills
01:40 - #2 Wall writings
01:58 - #3 Murder weapon
03:04 - #4 Book

Timestamp of jump scare:
04:08 - Killer jump scare

Want to play it for yourself:
Play it free on itch.io (https://leggomygiallo.itch.io/police-force)

Subscribe for more: If you enjoyed this video, I hope I can earn a subscription from you and a recommendation to your friends who like similar content! As small of a channel, every recommendation and share helps immensely. Be sure to hit the bell for notifications when new videos are posted.
